General.Name: GIIR Inc
General.Description: HS Ad Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an advertising and marketing communications company in South Korea and internationally. The company was formerly known as GIIR Inc. and changed its name to HS Ad Inc. in July 2023. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: LG Mapo Building, Seoul, South Korea
